description: React component definitions for a navigation menu UI, utilizing Radix UI primitives and custom styling.

methods.name: NavigationMenu
methods.description: React component for the root navigation menu container, forwarding ref and rendering children with a viewport.

methods.name: NavigationMenuList
methods.description: React component for the list of navigation items, forwarding ref and applying styles.

methods.name: NavigationMenuTrigger
methods.description: React component for the trigger button that opens submenus, including an icon and styling.

methods.name: NavigationMenuContent
methods.description: React component for the content area of the navigation menu, with animation and positioning styles.

methods.name: NavigationMenuViewport
methods.description: React component for the viewport container of the navigation menu.

methods.name: NavigationMenuIndicator
methods.description: React component for the indicator element showing active menu state.
